item.title: ACLU Warns DOGE’s ‘Unchecked’ Access Could Violate Federal Law
item.description: The ACLU says it stands ready to sue for access to government records that detail DOGE’s access to sensitive personnel data.

item.title: DOGE Builds ‘Firewall’ Between Musk’s Team and Legacy USDS Workers
